name: Nerko One
description: Nerko is a chunky ‘marker’ effect font. It gives a funky, exciting and modern look while staying smooth and sleek. Be as bold as the font while using a friendly style that makes users feel welcome in any circumstances. From paper to screen, this font was created using traditional Marker Pens on paper for guidance to give it a natural feeling. To contribute, please see github.com/nermink99/Nerko .
author: Nermin Kahrimanovic
